ITEM 21
Rad. Com.
Istanbul
PLACES MD DATES OF FUTURE MEETINGS
The Committee is very well placed as regards invitations
for the future, the situation being as follows :

The Committee might already like to consider the dates of
its Spring 1972 meeting bearing in mind that Easter falls early
that year, on 2 April. It is now known that the Technical Committee
is also meeting in Munich, at the invitation of the ZDF, between
10 - 14 April 1972 and in order not to clash with this meeting in
any way and, indeed, to facilitate observers from each Committee
being present at the otherâ€™s meeting, as has now become a well
established practice (unfortunately made impossible at Istanbul
since the two Committees are meeting simultaneously), the Secretary
would like to suggest that the Radio Programme Committee consider
the dates of Thursday 6, Friday 7 and Saturday 8 April 1972,
assuming, of course, the agreement of the ARD.
